title: Can't login to my main account.
body:
So yesterday everything was fine, but today i just can't login to my account! After long time i've changed the password (but it says im on EU west, but actually my account is on EUNE). So i know everything about my acc but just cant log in to it. I know email, name, password, name in game.

PLEASE HELP ME!
The in game name is : Weisick

replies.body:
My friend and I had the same problem. The login box only said that the password and username do not match, or something to that extent. Logging in on website, legacy client, and LCU didn't work. We are on NA server, and have been active players for many years.

Luckily we had our emails so we just reset the password, but it was a hassle.

Me: Umbreo
Friend: Elitebadger
What error are you seeing when you try logging in? This is very crucial to understand what's going on. :P
